title: Bug 49299 - Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 Incorrect Information on Custom Cookie Name and URL Rewriting
description: Bug 49299Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 says that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting
OB: The current behavior is not clearly described in the bug report.
EB: Expected result: Following the information in 7.1.1, I would expect the Reload link to be http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Navigate to http://localhost:8080/
2. Perform actions leading to URL rewriting, as described in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1.
